mapper.insert: insert into tp_video_config(category_id, learn_num, create_time, update_time) values(#{categoryId}, #{learnNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select cfg.id id, c.id category_id, c.name categoryName, v.cnt video_num, cfg.learn_num, cfg.create_time, cfg.update_time from tp_category c left join (select category_id, count(0) cnt from tp_video group by category_id) v on c.id = v.category_id left join tp_video_config cfg on c.id = cfg.category_id where c.type = 'VIDEO'
